name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blurry - Blur images & videos on web

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blur images on websites. Customize based on domains. Have halal tours!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blurry is a versatile browser extension designed to empower users with control over their online content viewing experience. With Blurry, you can effortlessly add a customizable blur effect to images, videos, and embedded content on websites, providing a more focused and distraction-free browsing environment.

Key Features:
1. Toggle Blur On/Off: Instantly toggle the blur effect on or off to adapt your content viewing based on your preferences.
2. Apply Preferences: Choose to apply blur preferences to specific domains and links, giving you tailored control over your browsing experience.
3. Customizable Blur: Adjust the blur intensity to suit your comfort level, ensuring a personalized and enjoyable browsing journey.
4. No Accounts/Info: Blurry needs no additional accounts or personal information – simply install and start customizing your online experience.
5. Future Visit Settings: Apply your blur preferences on all future visits to your favorite domains and links, maintaining a consistent browsing environment.

How to Use:
1. Install the Blurry extension.
2. Toggle blur on or off with a single click.
3. Customize blur preferences for specific domains and links.

Privacy Assurance:
Blurry prioritizes user privacy. No personal data is collected, ensuring a secure and private browsing experience.

Enhance your online content viewing with Blurry – the extension that puts you in control. Download now and experience the freedom to customize your web!
